description: This blueprint represents a workspace in Terraform Cloud
title: Terraform Cloud Workspace

workspaceName.title: Workspace Name
workspaceName.description: The name of the Terraform cloud workspace

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: The organization within which the workspace belongs to

createdAt.title: Creation Time
createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the workspace

updatedAt.title: Last Updated
updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the workspace

terraformVersion.title: Terraform Cloud Version
terraformVersion.description: Version of Terraform cloud used by the workspace

locked.title: Locked Status
locked.description: Indicates whether the workspace is locked

executionMode.title: Execution Mode
executionMode.description: The execution mode of the workspace

resourceCount.title: Resource Count
resourceCount.description: Number of resources managed by the workspace

latestChangeAt.title: Latest Change
latestChangeAt.description: Timestamp of the latest change in the workspace

description: This blueprint represents a run in Terraform cloud
title: Terraform Cloud Run

runId.title: Run ID
runId.description: The unique identifier of the Terraform cloud run

createdAt.title: Creation Time
createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the run

status.title: Run Status
status.description: The current status of the run

hasChanges.title: Has Changes
hasChanges.description: Indicates whether the run has changes

isDestroy.title: Is Destroy
isDestroy.description: Indicates whether the run is a destroy operation

terraformVersion.title: Terraform Cloud Version
terraformVersion.description: Version of Terraform cloud used in the run

appliedAt.title: Applied Time
appliedAt.description: Timestamp when the run was applied

plannedAt.title: Planned Time
plannedAt.description: Timestamp when the run was planned

source.title: Run Source
source.description: The source of the run initiation

description: This blueprint represents a version of a Terraform state version
title: Terraform Cloud State Versions

id.title: State Version ID
id.description: Unique identifier for the state version

createdAt.title: Creation Time
createdAt.description: Timestamp when the state version was created

serial.title: Serial Number
serial.description: A unique identifier for this version within the workspace

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the state version (e.g., 'queued', 'finished')

resourcesAdded.title: Resources Added
resourcesAdded.description: Number of resources added in this state version

resourcesChanged.title: Resources Changed
resourcesChanged.description: Number of resources changed in this state version

resourcesDestroyed.title: Resources Destroyed
resourcesDestroyed.description: Number of resources destroyed in this state version

hostedJsonDownloadUrl.title: Download Url
hostedJsonDownloadUrl.description: Url for downloading state version in json format

description.title: Description
description.description: Description or notes about the state version

vcsCommitUrl.title: VCS Commit URL
vcsCommitUrl.description: URL of the VCS commit that triggered this state version

description: This blueprint represents the output of a Terraform state version
title: Terraform State Version Output

outputId.title: Output ID
outputId.description: Unique identifier for the state version output

outputName.title: Output Name
outputName.description: The name of the output variable

sensitive.title: Sensitive
sensitive.description: Indicates whether the output is sensitive

type.title: Type
type.description: The data type of the output (e.g., 'string', 'number')

detailedType.title: Detailed Type
detailedType.description: More detailed type information of the output

selfLink.title: Self Link
selfLink.description: API link for the state version output
